hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Umamah that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:“The one who most deserved to be envied, un my view, is the one who has the least burden, who prays a great deal and finds joy in prayer, and who is unknown among people and is not paid any heed. His provision will be sufficient, he will be content with it, his death will come quickly, his estate will be small and his mourners will be few.”

chapter.eng-name: One who is not paid any heed
